subject: Basketball
Wages and Salaries
Suits and Litigation
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Portland Trail Blazers have stirred controversy by threatening to sue any team that signs Darius Miles, for whom they received salary-cap relief due to injury.
snippet: The Portland Trail Blazers have stirred controversy by threatening to sue any team that signs Darius Miles, for whom they received salary-cap relief due to injury.
